title: 2025–26 New York Knicks season
snippet: With the 50th overall pick, the Knicks selected Kobe Sanders, but immediately traded his draft rights to the Los Angeles Clippers in exchange for the 51st pick, which they used to select Mohamed Diawara, along with the draft rights to Luka Mitrović.
